apps.description: The world famous Football Management game just received a major upgrade. Nurture and develop your players, design training programmes for the team, choose formations, give tactical instruction to help your team win!
Global Assault is a FREE, squad-based RPG with tremendous 3D graphics! Take control of Havoc and adventure around the globe while competing against other players!

MAFIA vs. POLICE is an enthralling puzzle game where you decide whether to evolve the Mafia or develop the Police's authority. Plan your every move carefully; who wins and who ends up ruling the town depends on it.

You are a resistance leader tasked with forming an advanced rebel team to aid Katniss Everdeen and take back Panem! Explore each district in Panem, recruit rebels, and collect resources to aid you in victory.
Raise powerful dragons and ride them to conquer your enemies in strategic battles! Collect a variety of dragons with unique skills and experience the thrill of flying them into battle!
